text: is an shooter videogame release on Arcade and PlayStation 4. Released worldwide on 2015. Namco Bandai was also released Time Crisis 5: True Mastermind, and then on sale August at the same year. Including extra three bonus stage, and there are total 6 stages. Category:2015 video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Arcade games Category:Video game sequels
title: Time Crisis 5
